name: Amunets Deco Collector - v0.1.10
description:
A placeable that "collects" nearby decoration placeables and combines them into one.
Allow packing and unpacking of placeables on-the fly.

Improves server performance by reducing the number of individual placeable actors.
Improves client performance by using instanced static meshes for drawing.

This is supposed to work with any STATIC decoration item, however it uses a whitelist for now.

Does (currently) NOT support:
- skeletal meshes (like most flags)
- anything with interaction like doors, hatches, torches, instruments, traps etc.
- particles, lights etc.

Comes with prepared item lists for:
- Conan Exiles + DLCs
- Age of Calamitous
- Ancient Civilization
- Deco and Placeables
- Desert Town
- Dudes Delightful
- Emberlight
- ExilesExtreme
- GCam
- LdS-Modpack
- NothernTimber
- SavageSteel I & II
- Shadows of Skelos I & II
- ThrallWars DungeonMod
- Warrior Mutator

Discord @ https://discord.gg/a8hGAKW
changeNote:
2021-03-16 - v0.1.10
- better compression and faster replication.
- updated a bunch of vanilla materials to allow instancing. this allows even more stuff to be compressed, but bloats the mod a little.
- updated itemlists for Conan Exiles, DLCs and Dudes Delightful.
author: LilMissHentai
